derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in medical use): via late Latin from Greek kathartikos, from katharsis ‘cleansing’ (see catharsis)

entry.tran: 起到发泄作用的;宣泄情绪的
entry.def: Something that is cathartic has the effect of catharsis.

example.ex: His laughter was cathartic, an animal yelp that brought tears to his eyes.
example.tran: 他哈哈大笑以宣泄情绪，声音如野兽般尖厉，眼泪都笑出来了。
释放情感、宣泄情绪的体验
